Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 13th overall pick, by New York (A) in 1966...
Released by New York (A) on 3/2/1966...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles (N) on 3/2/1966 to a minor league deal...
Earned first career win on 5/15/1969...
Had first career hit on 7/13/1969, off Tommie Sisk (HOU)...
Won World Series with Los Angeles in 1971...
Traded from Los Angeles to Chicago (A) on 3/2/1974 (Going to LA: 3B M. Kakefu, P D. Vossler, RF C. Lemon. Going to CHW: C C. Fisk, RF R. Jackson, P J. James, P D. Eddy, P F. Jenkins)...
